com.fortify.util.spring.expression.helper

Class AbstractExpressionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.util.spring.expression.helper.AbstractExpressionHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExpressionHelper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InternalExpressionHelper

    public abstract class AbstractExpressionHelper
extends Object
implements IExpressionHelper
    This class provides several utility methods related to Spring Expression Language, for example for evaluating (template) expressions on input objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createExpressionParser

        protected org.springframework.expression.ExpressionParser createExpressionParser()
        Create the ExpressionParser to be used. This default implementation returns a new SpelExpressionParser instance configured with the configuration returned by the createSpelParserConfiguration() method. Subclasses can override this method to return a different ExpressionParser implementation.
        Returns:
        ExpressionParser instance that can be used to parse expressions

      • createSpelParserConfiguration

        protected org.springframework.expression.spel.SpelParserConfiguration createSpelParserConfiguration()
        Create the SpelParserConfiguration to be used for creating the default SpelExpressionParser returned by the createExpressionParser() method. This default implementation returns a default SpelParserConfiguration instance. Subclasses can override this method to modify the configuration.
        Returns:
        SpelParserConfiguration instance used for configuring an SpelExpressionParser

      • createTemplateParserContext

        protected org.springframework.expression.common.TemplateParserContext createTemplateParserContext()
        Create the TemplateParserContext to be used for parsing template expressions. This default implementation returns a TemplateParserContext configured with ${ as the expression prefix, and } as the expression suffix. Subclasses can override this method to provide a customized TemplateParserContext instance.
        Returns:
        TemplateParserContext instance

      • createEvaluationContext

        protected org.springframework.expression.EvaluationContext createEvaluationContext()
        Create the EvaluationContext to be used for evaluating expressions. This default implementation simply calls createStandardEvaluationContext() to create the EvaluationContext instances. Subclasses can override this method to provide a customized EvaluationContext instance.
        Returns:
        EvaluationContext instance

      • createStandardEvaluationContext

        protected final org.springframework.expression.spel.support.StandardEvaluationContext createStandardEvaluationContext()
        Create a StandardEvaluationContext configured with the property accessors returned by the createPropertyAccessors() method.
        Returns:
        StandardEvaluationContext instance

      • createPropertyAccessors

        protected List<org.springframework.expression.PropertyAccessor> createPropertyAccessors()
        Create the list of property accessors to be used. This default implementation adds ReflectivePropertyAccessor and MapAccessorIgnoreNonExistingProperties. Subclasses can override this method to modify this list of default accessors.
        Returns:
        List of PropertyAccessor instances

      • parseSimpleExpression

        public final SimpleExpression parseSimpleExpression(String exprStr)
        Parse the given string as a SpEL expression.
        Specified by:
        parseSimpleExpression in interface IExpressionHelper
        Parameters:
        exprStr - to be parsed as a simple expression
        Returns:
        The SpEL Expression object for the given expression string, or null if input is null

        Parse the given string as a SpEL template expression.
        Specified by:
        parseTemplateExpression in interface IExpressionHelper
        Parameters:
        exprStr - to be parsed as a template expression
        Returns:
